snippet.title: Cycles X
snippet.description:
Let's get together to celebrate the 10th anniversary of Cycles! 
Join Brecht, Sergey and Pablo for a livestream, and a special announcement.

snippet.title: USD Import and Export in Blender
snippet.description:
The USD pipeline in Blender gets a huge boost with the support for importing! Grab Blender 3.0 Alpha experimental builds to play with it yourself https://blender.org/experimental
Learn more about the USD project at https://developer.blender.org/project/view/118/ 

USD stands for "Universal Scene Description", a technology developed by Pixar and popular among 3D software pipelines. https://graphics.pixar.com/usd/docs/index.html

--

Support Blender development: https://fund.blender.org

snippet.title: Geometry Nodes Fields: Explained!
snippet.description:
What is this Fields thing everyone talks about? Dalai is here to explain! Let's convert an old file into the new system and see the advantages of the upcoming Geometry Nodes Fields workflow in Blender 3.0 Alpha.

- Download Blender 3.0 Alpha https://builder.blender.org/download/daily/
- Geometry Nodes project: https://developer.blender.org/tag/geometry_nodes/
- Read more about Fields https://code.blender.org/2021/08/attributes-and-fields/
- List of nodes to convert to Fields https://hackmd.io/ZbLbJhctSXqMLTAWXiSS0A?view

Support Blender development: https://fund.blender.org

snippet.title: The Future of Hair Grooming in Blender
snippet.description:
Andy Goralczyk from Blender Studio presents a new hair system for the upcoming Blender 3.3.

The new hair system uses new high performance curves objects and combine the flexibility of Geometry Nodes with powerful destructive tools for hair grooming.

* Learn more about the system: https://code.blender.org/2022/07/the-future-of-hair-grooming
* Download Einar's demo file: https://studio.blender.org/films/heist/gallery/?asset=6072

--

Support Blender development: https://fund.blender.org
Support the creation and sharing of Blender production knowledge at https://studio.blender.org

Download Blender Experimental builds: https://blender.org/experimental

snippet.title: Introducing: Hair Assets in Blender 3.5!
snippet.description:
Watch the step-by-step tutorial video at https://youtu.be/gCQN5vNgHiI on the @BlenderStudio channel.

Simon Thommes gives a quick intro on how the new Hair assets (node groups) in Blender 3.5 work. Grooming hair has never been this flexible!

* See all that's new in Blender 3.5: https://blender.org/features/releases/3-5/
* Download Blender 3.5: https://blender.org/download
* Get the demo files: https://www.blender.org/download/demo-files/#hair

Support the future of Blender by joining the Development Fund at https://fund.blender.org

snippet.title: Keying Animation Updates in Blender 4.1
snippet.description:
Blender 4.1 introduces a new way for inserting animation keyframes, for a simpler and more intuitive workflow.

Read about all changes related to animation and rigging in Blender 4.1: https://developer.blender.org/docs/release_notes/4.1/animation_rigging/#keying 

Blender 4.1 release notes: https://blender.org/download/releases/4-1/ 

Video by Rik Schutte from @BlenderStudio
